name: Unto Tomorrow's Morrow
descHash:
"See you tomorrow, Tribios..."

The girl wiped the tears on her cheeks when her mother went somewhere far, far away.

She waited one tomorrow after another, till she grew up to be someone like her mother.
She stands before the passage and grasps the Coreflame tight as she recalled her mother's words.

"There are no blizzards, colds, or rain at that place..."

"But if we can't see you tomorrow, then..."

She falls towards the earth, leaving her young figure behind, like a shooting star across the sky —

"Then, see you on tomorrow's morrow!"

29328.name: Credit
29328.desc: This currency, used by the Interastral Peace Corporation to settle accounts with its customers, is now widely accepted as the hard currency for space travel.
29328.lore: "People run around fighting and trading for numbers in a terminal, but the truly precious cannot be bought."

589812.name: Nourishing Honey
589812.desc: The nectar brewed from the juice of flowers growing on the heart tree in the sacred Vonwacq forest. A honey that can accelerate the growth of life. Used to level up Traces moderately for Abundance characters.
589812.lore:
When the Devil emerges from the fertile soil, it is only a round fruit with a stalk as long as a human's forearm. For some reason, it has to defeat its siblings before it has the right to drink nectar and grow into shape.

"You can drink the sap of any tree in this forest, except that one."

673753.name: Myriad Fruit
673753.desc: The fruit grown on the tip of the heart tree's branch in the sacred Vonwacq forest. It contains the essence of myriad lifeforms. Used to level up Traces significantly for Abundance characters.
673753.lore:
One day and night after drinking the nectar of the divine tree, the ridiculous spherical fruit bloats into a "Devil" wearing fiber armor and wielding a wooden spear and a shield made of leaves. All around its footsteps, living creatures in the forest offer their genes as tributes to the Devil for it to taste, learn, and metamorphose. After that, the Devil will move on to challenge the sea and the sky of Vonwacq.

"Through this method, the ancient sages imprisoned the most terrifying thing within a most ridiculous game."

694487.name: Refined Aether
694487.desc: Enhancement material for Light Cones, provides <nobr>6000</nobr> Light Cone EXP.
694487.lore:
A canister of aether that has been extracted and distilled using special procedures.

"The Garden looks forward to recreating a past glory, but it is a 'past glory' selected by them. Do you understand?"

694488.name: Condensed Aether
694488.desc: Enhancement material for Light Cones, provides <nobr>2000</nobr> Light Cone EXP.
694488.lore:
A can of Aether refined through special techniques.

"Handle with care, do not drop or place pressure upon it. If damages and leaks occur, please refer to chapter II of the Leak Disaster Response Manual for emergency response."

694489.name: Sparse Aether
694489.desc: Enhancement material for Light Cones, provides <nobr>500</nobr> Light Cone EXP.
694489.lore:
An imaginary substance that shouldn't exist in reality. The basic material to create Light Cones.
The images contained in the Light Cones become clearer when infused with this substance.

"I see, so this is the supposed 'memoria' of the Garden of Recollection. No wonder the Memokeepers can set off on galactic voyages with memories."

874339.name: Alien Tree Seed
874339.desc: The seed obtained from the fruit of the heart tree in the sacred Vonwacq forest, carrying the genes of various life forms. Used to level up Traces slightly for Abundance characters.
874339.lore:
The enormous alien holy tree in the sacred Vonwacq forest meticulously records the changes of the ecosystem over countless life cycles, continuously nurturing the ideal "Devil" using the genes of various life forms as seeds.

"Cut this hard fruit open, scoop out the seed from its flesh, and plant it in sacred soil. You'll harvest dozens of leaders in the following year. Just wait for them to decide a winner via a battle royale!"

20170864.name: Courage-Torn Chest
20170864.desc: A fragment of the Strife Titankins after their demise. Normal material used for enhancement.
20170864.lore:
The slothful generals began to drill, and the reclusive sages began to plot. Then humanity discovered they could shatter the creations of gods, and slaughter became war.

"Fear is the chisel of courage."
comeFrom: Titankin at Equilibrium Level 2 or higher
Crepuscular Beasts at Equilibrium Level 2 or higher

20389475.name: Glory-Aspersed Torso
20389475.desc: The heart of a Strife Titankin, full of divine power. Advanced material used for enhancement.
20389475.lore:
In the beginning, humanity fought wars to stay alive, but now some fight as fearlessly as the Titankins of Strife to achieve death. The Kremnoans say that perhaps warriors of flesh and stone share the same heart —

"And this heart is called glory, with courage flowing within."
comeFrom: Titankin at Equilibrium Level 4 or higher
Crepuscular Beasts at Equilibrium Level 4 or higher

20445700.name: Fear-Stomped Flesh
20445700.desc: Dust that forms the Strife Titankins. Crude material used for enhancement.
20445700.lore:
The tide of death sweeps across the world, and giants of hatred and resentment step forth from the River of Souls. All fear and cower before that stone-carved legion.

"Slaughter is the stone from which fear is hewn."

skill.name: Farewell
skill.descHash: Increases the wearer's Outgoing Healing by #1[i]%. When an ally target's current HP percentage is greater than or equal to #2[i]%, increases the DMG dealt by #3[i]%.
